asset-file-size/project-json-description: This is the file that stores the project's code, variables, lists and most costume, sound, backdrop and sprite info. If it exceeds 5MiB, the project will not save.
asset-file-size/assets-description: Costumes, backdrops and sounds that exceed 10MB. If any of them exceeds this limit, the project will not save.
asset-file-size/assets-none-costume: There are no large assets. The currently largest asset is the costume "{assetName}" ({fileSize}) in {sprite}.
asset-file-size/assets-none-backdrop: There are no large assets. The currently largest asset is the backdrop "{assetName}" ({fileSize}).
asset-file-size/assets-none-sound: There are no large assets. The currently largest asset is the sound "{assetName}" ({fileSize}) in {sprite}.
